comments:
1. start with Eclipse 3.3RC2 SDK. Here's my script:

#!/bin/bash
cd /home/nickb/eclipse/rc2clean
workspace=/tmp/workspace-clean-rc2
rm -fr $workspace eclipse
tar xzf eclipse-SDK-3.3RC2-linux-gtk.tar.gz
./eclipse/eclipse -vm /opt/ibm-java2-5.0/bin/java -data $workspace -consolelog &

2. install some projects ('find new features') into a separate install location (eg., /home/nickb/eclipse/rc2clean/emf-jet) using the Europa Discovery site (Ottawa Fullmoon mirror):

  EMF Runtime, JET SDK

Note that I could not reproduce this problem when installing just EMF, XSD & UML2 Runtimes, or EMF, UML2, OCL Runtimes (as dependencies of) EMF-QTV SDK. Maybe this is a JET problem?

3. click Apply Changes instead of restarting Eclipse.

This problem happens whenever org.eclipse.xsd isn't installed.  It should just silently ignore that condition and I've committed the changes to do just that.
